TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DynamicDataExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DynamicDataExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 ASP.NET 动态数据所使用的扩展方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

returns.span: 如果 是 或空字符串，并且 的 属性是 ，则为 ；如果 不是 或空字符串，并且匹配 的 属性，则为 ；否则为未更改的值 。

span.span: if is or an empty string and the property of is ; if is not or an empty string and matches the property of ; otherwise, the unchanged value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关格式设置选项的信息，请参阅键入概述。For information about formatting options, see the type overview. ## Examples 下面的示例显示如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. 此示例获取用户输入从配置为接受日期时间数据的字段模板。The example gets user input from a field template that is configured to accept date-time data. 在 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs 或 DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb 文件中，该方法将空字符串转换为`null`。In the DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs or DynamicData\FieldTemplates\DateTime_Edit.ascx.vb file, the method converts empty strings to `null`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/DateTime_Edit.ascx.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnablePersistedSelection (this System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);
.method public static hidebysig void EnablePersistedSelection(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub EnablePersistedSelection (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use the EnablePersistedSelection property on a databound control such as GridView or ListView.")

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 数据绑定控件。

span.span: The data bound control.

summary.span: 使选定内容能够保留在支持选择和分页的数据控件中。

span.span: Enables selection to be persisted in data controls that support selection and paging.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展控件中，并支持对所选内容，分页和排序，调用此方法使要保留所选内容，即使在所选的行不可见的控件。In controls that extend and that support selection, paging, and sorting, calling this method enables the control to persist selection even when the selected row is not visible. 例如，如果用户选择行，然后转至另一页，或者如果用户对数据进行排序，所选的行处于选定状态。For example, if the user selects a row and then pages to another page, or if the user sorts the data, the selected row remains selected. 如果不调用此方法，选择将丢失，当用户分页或排序。If this method is not called, selection is lost when the user pages or sorts. 方法调用 。The method calls .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExpandDynamicWhereParameters (this System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource dataSource);
.method public static hidebysig void ExpandDynamicWhereParameters(class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource dataSource) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub ExpandDynamicWhereParameters (dataSource As IDynamicDataSource)

param.name: dataSource
param.span: 数据源对象。

span.span: The data source object.

summary.span: 将动态筛选器扩展到可供数据源使用的 参数中。

span.span: Expands dynamic filters into parameters that are usable by the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会扩展的当前实例的值和控件分成了`Where`可用数据源的查询中的参数。This method expands the values of the current instances of the and controls into `Where` parameters that are usable in queries by the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl (this System.Web.UI.Control current);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource FindDataSourceControl(class System.Web.UI.Control current) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function FindDataSourceControl (current As Control) As IDynamicDataSource

param.name: current
param.span: 一个控件，位于您要查找其包含控件的数据绑定控件的层次结构中。

span.span: A control inside the hierarchy of a data-bound control whose containing control you want to find.

summary.span: 返回与指定控件的数据控件关联的数据源。

span.span: Returns the data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

returns.span: 与指定控件的数据控件关联的数据源。

span.span: The data source that is associated with the data control for the specified control.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何查找包含的数据源控件。The following example shows how to find the containing data source control. 在示例中，动态数据页模板复制到要为 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表中提供自定义显示的 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹中。In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 文件标记更改为添加`OnDataBound`名为的事件处理程序`DetailsView1_DataBound`，在其中调用方法来查找该数据源控件。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find the data source control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.UI.Control FindFieldTemplate (this System.Web.UI.Control control, string columnName);

param.name: control
param.span: 包含控件。

param.name: columnName
param.span: 列的名称。

span.span: The name of the column.

summary.span: 返回指定控件的命名容器中指定列的字段模板。

span.span: Returns the field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

returns.span: 指定控件的命名容器中指定列的字段模板。

span.span: The field template for the specified column in the specified control's naming container.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为指定的列名称查找在文本框控件。The following example shows how to find the text box control for a specified column name. 在示例中，动态数据页模板复制到要为 AdventureWorksLT 数据库的 ProductDescription 表中提供自定义显示的 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 文件夹中。In example, the Dynamic Data page templates are copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 文件标记更改为添加`OnDataBound`名为的事件处理程序`DetailsView1_DataBound`，在其中调用方法来查找文本框控件。The Insert.aspx file markup is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`, in which the method is called to find a text box control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]
